formalText: He wants concrete suggestions as far as per-year low-cost mental health for his brother
One of the resources is near Southwest with providers finishing up their PHD who need hours and I think it's you pay on a sliding scale and he told his brother to look into it.
He wants more of a hospital in New York. He will try to get ahold of the psych ER and ask if there are any good Community clinics or other low-cost mental health clinics
One of the services discussed with the brother included mostly group based therapy and skills work
which is a lot of CBT and DBT.
Discussed with him how they are pretty structured and problem-focused very focused on charges for dealing with how you feel and things you need to function everything like that.
After talking, told him that his brother is probably going to go once or twice a week.
On Friday, his brother calls him and he is not doing well.
It made him extremely worried about him.
He contacted his roommate and but didn't feel like he could help enough. He is present today to find some resources for his brother's depression
He has a plan to trying to get his brother Healthcare so he can get a needed prescription
depression but it was not completely discussed in the session
His brother just quit his job and "he's not feeling too hot right now". He does not really approve of the girl his brother is dating
